actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to improve the reliability, safety, and energy efficiency of transportation and to reduce unemployment by providing funds for work in repairing, rehabilitating, and improving essential railroad roadbeds and facilities.
short_title: Emergency Oil Transportation Improvement and Employment Act

summary.text: Emergency Rail Transportation Improvement and Employment Act - Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation in consultation with the Secretary of Labor to provide financial assistance to eligible applicants for programs aimed at reducing unemployment and at repairing, rehabilitating, or improving essential railroad roadbeds and facilities. Sets forth guidelines and procedures for grant applications. Provides that grants made to eligible applicants pursuant to this Act shall be used solely to pay the wages, and other benefits earned by individuals employed in programs funded by this Act. Authorizes $600,000,000 to be appropriated for the purpose of making such grants.

titles.title: Emergency Oil Transportation Improvement and Employment Act

A bill to improve the reliability, safety, and energy efficiency of transportation and to reduce unemployment by providing funds for work in repairing, rehabilitating, and improving essential railroad roadbeds and facilities.
